explanation: [0-0] The video takes place in a brightly lit room. A woman wearing a yellow T-shirt is sitting at a table with two colorful objects on it. The woman holds a yellow object in her right hand and a metal utensil in her left hand, which is placed on a blue-green plate. She rubs the object in her right hand against the utensil in her left. The background wall is white, with a TV mounted on it. There is a pink and white curtain on the wall behind. There are two colorful toys below the TV and in front of the curtain.

[0-6] Then, a man wearing an orange T-shirt appears from the left side of the frame and sits down on a chair. He pats the woman's shoulder with his left hand, and the woman turns to the right to look at him. The man rubs his face with his right hand in a fist. Afterward, the woman looks forward in confusion, and the man puts down his right hand and tilts his head to the right.
